title: Plex Media Server
description: Comprehensive Plex ecosystem monitoring — streams, library, downloads, server health, storage

targets.query: from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "stream_count") |> last()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total_bandwidth") |> last() |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000}))

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "wan_bandwidth") |> last() |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000}))

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "lan_bandwidth") |> last() |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000}))
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "transcode_streams") |> last()
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "direct_play_streams") |> last()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "Session") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> keep(columns:["friendly_name","username","title","quality","video_decision","platform","progress_percent","full_location","media_type"])

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "Session") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> map(fn:(r) => ({friendly_name: r.friendly_name, title: r.title, location: r.full_location, lat: float(v: r.latitude), lon: float(v: r.longitude)}))

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "direct_play_streams" or r._field == "direct_streams" or r._field == "transcode_streams") |> last() |> group()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "library_stats" and r.section_type == "movie") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total") |> last() |> group() |> sum()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "library_stats" and r.section_type == "show") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total") |> last() |> group() |> sum()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "library_stats" and r.section_type == "show") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "seasons") |> last() |> group() |> sum()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "library_stats" and r.section_type == "show") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "episodes") |> last() |> group() |> sum()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Tautulli" and r.type == "current_stream_stats") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "stream_count" or r._field == "transcode_streams" or r._field == "direct_play_streams" or r._field == "direct_streams") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Radarr" and r.type == "Queue") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> count()
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Sonarr" and r.type == "Queue") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> count()
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Radarr" and r.type == "Missing") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> count()
from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Sonarr" and r.type == "Missing") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> count()

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Radarr" and r.type == "Queue") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> keep(columns:["name","quality","protocol","_time"])

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Sonarr" and r.type == "Queue") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> keep(columns:["name","epname","sxe","quality","protocol","_time"])

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Radarr" and r.type == "Missing") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> keep(columns:["name","_time"])

from(bucket:"varken") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Sonarr" and r.type == "Missing") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "hash") |> group() |> last() |> keep(columns:["name","epname","sxe","airsUTC","_time"])
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r.cpu == "cpu-total") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "usage_active") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "mem") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used_percent") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "system") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "uptime") |> last()

from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -3m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "bytes_sent") |> filter(fn:(r) => r.interface != "lo") |> group(columns:["interface"]) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) |> group() |> sum() |> last()

from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -3m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "bytes_recv") |> filter(fn:(r) => r.interface != "lo") |> group(columns:["interface"]) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) |> group() |> sum() |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "system") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "load1") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "system") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "load5") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "system") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "n_cpus") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "mem") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "mem") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used") |> last()

from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r.cpu == "cpu-total") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "usage_active") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> set(key:"_field", value:"CPU %")

from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "mem") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used_percent") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> set(key:"_field", value:"RAM %")
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path != "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used_percent") |> last() |> first()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path != "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used") |> last() |> first()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path != "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "free") |> last() |> first()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path == "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path == "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "free") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path == "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total") |> last()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path != "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "total") |> last() |> first()
from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: -2m) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.path == "/run/host_mark/Users") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "used_percent") |> last()

from(bucket:"telegraf") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "docker_container_mem") |> filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "usage") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> group(columns:["container_name"])
